name: Customer Purchase History
query:
SELECT
    sii.item_code     AS "Item Code:Link/Item:200",
    sii.item_name     AS "Item Name:Data:350",
    sii.qty           AS "Qty:Float:80",
    sii.uom           AS "UOM:Link/UOM:80",
    sii.rate          AS "Rate:Currency:100",
    sii.amount        AS "Amount:Currency:110",
    si.posting_date   AS "Posting Date:Date:100",
    si.name           AS "Sales Invoice No:Link/Sales Invoice:200",
    si.posting_date   AS "Event Date:Date:100"
FROM
    `tabSales Invoice` si
JOIN
    `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON sii.parent = si.name
WHERE
    si.docstatus = 1
    AND (%(customer)s IS NULL OR %(customer)s = '' OR si.customer = %(customer)s)
    AND (si.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s)
ORDER BY
    si.posting_date DESC, sii.item_code;
